original_text: I watched the ram as it charged toward the west and the north and the south. No animal could stand against it, and none could rescue from its power. It did as it pleased and became great.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 그 숫양이 서쪽과 북쪽과 남쪽을 향하여 받으나 그것을 당할 짐승이 하나도 없고 그 손에서 구할 자가 없으므로 그것이 원하는 대로 행하고 강하여졌더라

sentences.original_text: as it charged toward the west
and the north and the south
No animal could stand against it
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 짐승도 그 앞에 서지 못하며

sentences.original_text: and none could rescue from its power
